replies.body:
Is this enough to dial back a little with a Hot Fix?

Edit: Seems like he's at 50% win rate now.
They probably should have changed his passive from 2% to 3% instead of 2% to 4%

I mained Brand for two seasons. I'm out of touch with the current meta, but I've been saying the same thing about Brand for ages. 

What Brand needs to succeed in midlane is better waveclear per mana. In particular, I'd like to see the entire AP scaling on his passive explosion replaced by stronger AP scaling on Conflagration. E.g. someone like Anivia destroys Brand because he can't challenge her and he can't keep up with her waveclear.

> [{quoted}](name=Eedat,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=Ti1EPrdo,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2018-01-12T15:28:55.400+0000)
>
> They probably should have changed his passive from 2% to 3% instead of 2% to 4%

Riot has never done anything in half measure.
The pun is such a buff to the situation.
unneeded buffs
He was at 45% win rate. Buffs were justified, they just overshot their goal.
Should have been 3% instead of 4% burn damage.
But 3 is an odd number, can't have that

Ornn has a 48% winrate.

Does he need buffs?
Ornn has no bad matchups and cancer utility, brand does not.
Brand has no bad matchups bot lane. He controls it. He is no longer played as a mid champ.
Brand bot isn't that hard to deal with
You really like stalking and crying when you have no clue what you're talking about.

Hey I'm sure that I saw Brand Supp in a pro match, I think it was in 2017 MSI against G2, I don't remember it all but I saw a Brand Supp.

Anyway Brand was in a bad spot and needed buffs, the fact that he was played in a pro game doesn't really matter.
He was played by likkrit bc he does it a lot in solo q or some shit but it wasn't that good, just a weaker brand mid.
I'm saying Winrate is a shit argument. While I agree Brand is weak, powercreep is unneeded.

I mean Aurelion Sol has a higher winrate mid with a slightly higger pick rate.  Does he need nerfs too?

Seriously, let it play out a little bit lol.
The problem is more than likely that hes about to become overbearing as a botlane support mage.

He's at 49% Wingate as support though.  

People just need to chill. The patch just hit.
But Brand is a mid laner. Not a support.
He's both a mid laner and a support.
Pretty sure they intentionally made changes specifically to move him to the mid lane. Same with Morg.
No? They don't wanna get him off bot and neither did they try to do that to Morg. They just helped them get back into solo lanes while still letting them be supports.
Yes, they 100% did lol. They for sure did it with Brand and they for sure did it with Morgana
What exactly did they do that doesn't enable them to work on the support role anymore? Buffing his damage suddenly makes him a bad support? Flawless logic.

How about nerfing the mana regen on the spell thief line then giving him a mechanic that restores Mana when he last hits minions to compensate? How about also giving the spell thief line an internal CD so he doesn't instantly proc every stack by tagging you with anything because of his passive?

Those are indirect nerfs and were not only meant to hit Brand lmao. And they didn't nerf Brand when they added the mana  restoration on unit kills, they simply tried to help lane Brand while keeping supp Brand the same. You do get that Brand and Morg still have a bigger play rate as supports than they do as midlaners, right?

Yes. Changes aimed directly to nerf damage supports such as Brand among others. Brand was a popular support at the time so to nerf him only in that role they decided to hit the support item instead of him directly then have him a mechanic that is only useful on Mid Brand. It's called causation.
No that means that more mage supports were out of line or that the item was too good. You don't nerf an item if only 1 champion is good with it.

> Spellthief’s Edge Line
> Most mage supports already churn out pretty decent damage (looking at you, Zyra/Brand)

He was literally called out by name in the official patch notes.

Try again.
Jesus, so nerfing him means wanting him to not go support anymore?

Nothing they did nerfed damage as support on either. If anything, Morg harasses faster and Harder (I play Morg) and Brand is now doing pure more damage (The Mana issues don't matter; always ways to sustain mana)

***Brand is NOT a support period***

Brand is in no way shape or form a support. The only utility Brand offers his team is a single 1.5 sec single target super unreliable stun. That does not make you a support. Just because you play bot lane does not make you a support. The same way playing Ziggs or Morde in the bot lane carry position does not make them ADCs. 

Brand "support" is actually Brand "bot lane APC". Brand "support" should never ever be allowed to be a thing because essentially all that means is he does WAY too much damage with no items. Damage is the only thing Brand offers to a team. You should need items to be an effective carry. You can't get those items effectively on a Support's budget. Brand "support" being viable means his base damages are WAY too high
Semantics. It's still queuing up as the Support role, just a different consensus on how to play the game.
For now, I mean the patch just hit, wait till people see the spike in power, they will start showing up in more matches #BanThatBrand2018

Thats not what im saying. the fact is when they make midlane buffs, those buff tend to fall into the sup role.

him being 49% considering hes not even a sup, and only really gets picked by autofilled players who dont want to really play sup is decent in itself.

So now they just amp his poke damage alot so going melee sups is going to feel like a nightmare
You have to be willfully ignorant to not understand brand's rework turned him into a dedicated supp.

No he wasn't just because he wasn't made strong to the point of being a meta midlaner but found play as sup doesn't mean he's a sup.


That's like saying just because mord found play at adc that he's an adc after his rework, but he's not.

He still Queues 53% as support, has the second highest damage of all Supports, has the highest kills of all supports, and has the highest gold of all supports.

Semantics of whether he's a Mid or Support or what he does in that role doesn't matter. What matters is 53% of all brand players play  him as support, and people in bot feel it. You can't lane vs a Brand. You have to turtle and hope and pray for a jungler to 3v2 it. There are no natural Support or ADC counters to Brand as support. He is currently also #2 in least deaths on a Support.
He's at 54%, and 58% pre 20 minutes.
Next thing you know they add a deathfire rune back into the game, and don't touch Brand for 6 patches.
They already said they're not adding DFT back
They've actually talked about adding it, and a 4th rune Keystone for Resolve.

To be honest. I would rather trust lolalytics with stats.
https://lolalytics.com/ranked/worldwide/platinum/plus/champion/Brand/

I tried checking lolaylitics but I'm on my phone and lolaylitics mobile site is trash. I can't tell if I'm viewing their default 7 day plat+ data or the 8.1 only data

Edit: your link is for the 7 day data, not 8.1 data

https://lolalytics.com/ranked/worldwide/current/platinum/plus/champion/Brand/

He's showing only 51.5% on that site though

> [{quoted}](name=JungleTaliyahWTF,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=Ti1EPrdo,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2018-01-12T15:38:49.076+0000)
>
> To be honest. I would rather trust lolalytics with stats.
> https://lolalytics.com/ranked/worldwide/platinum/plus/champion/Brand/

> [{quoted}](name=JungleTaliyahWTF,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=Ti1EPrdo,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2018-01-12T15:38:49.076+0000)
>
> To be honest. I would rather trust lolalytics with stats.
> https://lolalytics.com/ranked/worldwide/platinum/plus/champion/Brand/

Everyone's WR is lower in lolalytics so relatively speaking he is still in the same spot there as he is anywhere else which is a bit high. I mean he is beating low skill burst champs like Annie.

He has a 1.5% playrate and his support winrate is still below 50%.  But sure just delete him from the game what does it matter mid is total trash with nothing but kats and oris and xeraths making it impossible for you to play mages so what's another dead mage really.
